column2: §Y$TARGET$§! is storing plenty of wealth in their vaults. It's time to give it to someone more worthy.
§Y$TARGET$§! has young maidens in their court. It's time to "persuade" them to join us, by force if need be.
Summons the guildmaster of a local slavers guild to your court.
You Summon the guild master of a nearby slaver's guild, with a polite bow he asks how he can be of assistance.
You have decieded to fund a group of slavers. In return for funding them you will get a portion of the slaves they capture.
Have slavers capture slaves from your realm
Have slavers capture slaves from foreign lands

You have decided to have the slavers capture slaves in your realm. You will get your share of slaves when they return. They will be gone for one month. In preperation for the haul the guildhall will be closed unitl they return.

You have decided to have the slavers capture slaves from foreign realms. You will get your share of slaves when they return. They will be gone for three months. In preperation for the haul the guildhall will be closed unitl they return.
The slavers have returned from hunting in your lands. Their leader asks you to collect your share
The slavers have returned from hunting foreign lands. Their leader asks you to collect your share
A guildhall for Slavers. Has a dock and holding areas for slave trafficing.
The guildmaster asks what type of slave you are looking for: one from the local area, one from a foreign realm, or a truly exotic slave?
You are led to the pens containing slaves from the local area. The guildmaster asks if you want a male or female slave?
You are led to the pens containing slaves from foreign lands. The guildmaster asks if you want a male or female slave?
You are led to the pens containing slaves from foreign lands. The guildmaster asks if you want a male or female slave?
A Guild dedicated to the capture, training and selling of slaves.
Visit one of your private pleasure slaves
ONLY THE AI SHOULD SEE THIS, PLEASE REPORT IF YOU ARE SEEING THIS!
ONLY THE AI SHOULD SEE THIS, PLEASE REPORT IF YOU ARE SEEING THIS!
Grant your vassal or coutier the privilege of using your private slaves.
Allowed to use leige's Private slaves
A resting place for dragons. Allows for trade with the Elder Forest.
A home for the realm's dragons. Courtiers or vassals can be assigned as weyrleaders to tend to the dragons' everyday needs.
A large room that is well insulated and heated. Serves as a resting place for half-dragons who are looking to get out of the cold... and warm themselves up with others of their kind.
